position: Fullstack Web Developer & Digital Systems Consultant
desc_array: Designed and delivered business productivity solutions for small business clients, with a focus on Microsoft 365 administration, SharePoint configuration, and workflow automation to streamline operations.
Built and maintained relational database architectures, ensuring data integrity, performance optimisation, and secure access across integrated systems.
Configured and managed application environments including domains, hosting, DNS, and security settings to support reliable system operations.
Developed and deployed user-friendly web applications to meet client requirements, with emphasis on usability, accessibility, and performance.
Led end-to-end project delivery from requirements analysis and scoping through to testing, deployment, and user training, ensuring solutions aligned with business objectives.
Produced system documentation and delivered training sessions, increasing adoption rates and reducing ongoing support requests.
Provided ongoing application administration and support, including updates, troubleshooting, and vendor liaison for escalated technical issues.

description: Completed a comprehensive program that enhances my expertise in modern web technologies, full-stack architecture, and project-based software development. Gained hands-on experience with frontend frameworks, backend services, and deployment practices aligned with industry standards.

desc_array: Maintained and enhanced company B2B websites, with a focus on updating frontend code and implementing UI improvements.
Used Pronto ERP for operational tasks, including sales, CRM, and inventory data analysis, as well as reporting to support business decision-making.
Developed internal tools and workflow automation using Microsoft PowerApps and Power Automate, improving process efficiency.
Created and maintained SharePoint-based knowledge management systems to streamline internal documentation and cross-departmental information sharing.
Designed and delivered personalised EDM campaigns, using customer segments derived from CRM and sales data to increase engagement and drive repeat business.
Collaborated with external technology vendors to ideate digital solutions, troubleshoot technical issues, and implement improvements within business constraints.

position: Master of Business Information Management and Systems
description: Developed a strong foundation in business processes, systems analysis, and database management. Gained essential skills in bridging the gap between technology and business needs through data-driven systems and digital solutions.

desc_array: Designed and maintained WordPress-based web platforms, including theme customisation, plugin integration, and content updates to support marketing and customer engagement.
Designed implemented relational database schemas and implemented order and customer management systems, enabling efficient business operations and accurate record-keeping.
Built and customised SaaS applications to automate workflows, streamline operations, and support inter-departmental processes.
Conducted sales data analysis to assist the sales team with performance tracking, territory targeting, and opportunity identification.
Collaborated with the engineering team to document technical specifications and write clear, user-focused product manuals and guides.
Worked with both sales and engineering teams to design system solutions for client needs, ensuring alignment with business goals and technical feasibility.

description: Completed foundational studies in microeconomics, macroeconomics, and international trade. Developed analytical thinking and problem-solving skills applicable to both business and technology environments.
